properties.entry:
Practice Round Instructions

You will now have {duration} to practice with the experimental environment. The decisions you make in this round will not affect your earnings. At the beginning of the practice round {initialDistribution} of the cells are occupied with green tokens. The environment is a {self.resourceWidth} x {self.resourceDepth} grid of cells.

During this practice round, and only during this practice round, you will be able to reset the tokens displayed on the screen by pressing the R key. When you press the R key you will reset the distribution of the tokens to once again randomly occupy {initialDistribution} of the cells with tokens.

If you have any questions please raise your hand. Do you have any questions so far?
